seo.title: Vernazza Events 2025 | Festivals & Celebrations in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Discover events and festivals in Vernazza. Traditional celebrations, feast days, and seasonal events in Cinque Terre's most beautiful village.

body.title: Events & Festivals
body.subtitle: Experience authentic Italian celebrations in the heart of Vernazza. Traditional feast days, summer concerts, and local festivals by the harbor.

features.title: Santa Margherita Feast
features.description: June 20 - Main patron saint festival with processions and fireworks.

features.title: Midsummer Bonfire
features.description: June 24 - San Giovanni celebration on the beach.

features.title: Summer Concerts
features.description: July-August - Live music performances in the piazza.

features.title: Harvest Festival
features.description: September - Celebrate the grape harvest with tastings.

features.title: Religious Processions
features.description: Easter and Corpus Christi with elaborate harbor ceremonies.

features.title: Christmas Lights
features.description: December - Harbor illuminations and nativity displays.
